00065 class MIXIM_API ChannelAccess : public BatteryAccess, protected ChannelMobilityAccessType

00093   simtime_t calculatePropagationDelay(const NicEntry* nic);
00094 
00104   void sendToChannel(cPacket *msg);
00105 
00108   const cModule* getNic() const {
00109     return getParentModule();
00110   }
00111   cModule* getNic() {
00112     return getParentModule();
00113   }
00114 private:

00120   ChannelAccess& operator=(const ChannelAccess&);
00121

00124     : BatteryAccess()

00136     , useSendDirect(false)
00137     , cc(NULL)
00138     , coreDebug(false)
00139     , usePropagationDelay(false)
00140     , isRegistered(false)
00141     , world(NULL)
00142   {}
00143   virtual ~ChannelAccess() {}
